member.name: M:CsExtensions.ArrayExtensions.Extend``1(``0[],``0[])
member.summary:
Extends the first array by adding the second one to it.
**Out of place**
This does not remove nulls.
member.param: The array to be first in the new one.
The array to be set behind the first one.
member.returns: The new array being the concatination of both given arrays.

member.name: T:CsExtensions.Console.DynamicTestConsole
member.summary:
A dynamic method to list all public static methods of the given classe. Those then can be executed by typing the corresponding number.
Use Comment-Attributes to write a comment to those methods. This makes the identification much easier.

member.name: M:CsExtensions.Console.DynamicTestConsole.Start``1
member.summary: Reads all public static methods of T, lists them and waits for the users input.
member.typeparam: The class to be analyzed. Most likely the Program.cs, from which the Method is called.

member.name: T:CsExtensions.Console.DynamicTestConsole.Comment
member.summary:
Simple Comment-Attribute for use with the DynamicTestConsole.
For use, just put [Comment("Your comment here")] above the desired method. It then will be displayed in the list, given by DynamicTestConsole.Start<T>().

member.name: M:CsExtensions.Console.DynamicTestConsole.Comment.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a comment.
